entry.title: Hello En World
entry.content:
(say “hi”)

(def name “Romeo”)

So, I see you already found what language I like.

I’m engineer (not really like word developer). And I’m sure you see that I born in non-english country.

I had a blog maybe for five years, but than I understand that google know too much about me. It was personal and proffesion blog. So know I don’t wanna do that mistake, and this will be only profession blog, without second name and save you from my life story.
